Projects

From prompt engineering to platform architecture AI that ships

entAIngine (2023Present) Co-founder & CTO

Multi-tenant AI platform for controlled, compliant LLM workflows. Built with RBAC, content routing, and provider-agnostic integration (OpenAI, Azure, Bedrock, Mistral). Handles >1,000 concurrent connections and thousands of RPS with event-driven microservices on AWS. Delivered ISO 27001/SOC 2 compliance in ~3 months.

Tech: AWS Lambda, ECS/Fargate, SNS/SQS, OpenAI, Azure, Bedrock, Mistral, RAG, RBAC
Impact: Faster AI adoption; production-grade reliability; enterprise security for 50+ organizations.
Website Repo

entAIgent (2023) Lead Architect

No-code platform for orchestrating multi-step AI agents. Built visual builder, team orchestration, and tool integrations with safeguards and evaluation frameworks. Reduced agent PoC deployment from weeks to days.

Tech: AI Agents, No-Code, Orchestration, Evals
Impact: Consistent outcomes across teams; faster agent development.

FlowHive (20222023) Senior AI Engineer

Unified AI workspace to reduce fragmented tools and costs. Built seamless model switching, caching, and integration for research, agents, and analysis workflows. Improved iteration speed and reduced per-seat expenses.

Tech: Multi-Model, Workspace, Caching, Research
Impact: Reduced tool sprawl; faster iteration loops.

Valuation Engine (2022) Technical Lead

AI copilot for property appraisals. Automated data aggregation and report drafting for local-market research. Cut manual work from hours to minutes per report.

Tech: Real Estate, Copilot, Automation, Reports
Impact: ~2 hours saved per report; higher consistency; easier reviews.

KnowledgeX (20212022) Co-founder & Architect

Blockchain-based analytics marketplace for safe data collaboration. Built with confidential compute and auditable workflows to enable cross-org insights without exposing sensitive data. Validated with EU stakeholders.

Tech: Blockchain, Confidential Compute, Analytics, Privacy
Impact: Safe collaboration; prototype validated with EU partners.
